Title: The Goodbyes
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Nancy Fichman, Jennifer Hoppe, Julieanne Smolinski (executive story editor), David Budin (staff writer), Brendan McCarthy (staff writer)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Coyote shares some surprising news. Things go awry when Frankie and Sol host a family brunch. Grace must make a difficult decision about Phil.
